item.title: Rstudioconf2020 Agenda
item.description: I needed to put something together to be able decide what session to attend at the upcoming rstudioconf in San Francisco. Day 1 html { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', Arial, sans-serif; } #nktalxgulx .

item.title: Aspirations for 2020
item.description: A lot of folks on twitter are posting retrospectives on the year (or decade) and laying out goals for 2020. I wanted to do the same for myself. Technical Goals Build a shiny app Read datascienceatthecommandline Contribute more to open source Learn more about machine learning Professional/Non-technical goals Write more blog posts/more work in public Speak at least two conferences Non-technical Goals Workout once a week Go to bed earlier Read at least one fiction book a quarter Drink (a little) less

item.title: Iterating to a Better Visualization
item.description: A few months ago I was presented with a visualization at work by a colleague who was very excited about it. They were adamant that I add it to the analytics package I was working on.
